creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Man in the middleground naked from the waist up; he sits in a chair facing forward and gestures with his hands; the words "February March April May/He talks to himself at night" inscribed, UC
inscription: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark, annotated in red pencil
portfolio: From Suite of 12 Prints, Working Proofs
title: Study for "He Talks to Himself at Night", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
